title: Enter the dates when you can't go to a hearing
titleEdit: Enter a date you can't go to a hearing
itsImportant: It’s important that you make yourself available for a hearing. If you postpone or don’t show up, your appeal could go ahead in your absence or be delayed by several months.
yourHearing: Your hearing will take some time to book so only enter dates between 4 and 12 weeks in the future. Don’t include weekends or bank holidays.

error.allRequired: Enter the date you can't attend
error.dayRequired: You need to enter a day
error.monthRequired: You need to enter a month
error.yearRequired: You need to enter a year
